options.content:
### üîß SSH Terminal Panel

This panel provides an interactive SSH terminal directly within the Grafana dashboard by embedding an [**Wetty**](https://github.com/butlerx/wetty) session via an iframe.

The terminal connects to the target machine using Wetty, a web-based SSH client, allowing for live command execution and system interaction without leaving the dashboard.

**Use Cases:**
- Real-time troubleshooting
- Manual command execution
- Remote monitoring and maintenance

> **‚ö†Ô∏è Note:** Access to this terminal is subject to the same authentication and security policies configured on the target host. Ensure only authorized users can access this dashboard.

**Embedded URL:**  
`https://<target-machine>:3020`
